snippet.title: Car Tune: Project - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Car Tune is a Build & Tune racing game that has been in development since 2016. The current version of Car Tune came to be after many years of experimental tempering with various game mechanics and coding vehicle physics. 

Game features:
- Visual modifications & mechanical tuning,
- Realistic driving model & damage physics,
- Racing licenses,
- A Large variety of racing modes,
- Car audio & tuning game events,
- Multi-language support,
- Photo mode.

Upcoming features:
- More cars, parts and game types,
- Garage customization,
- Player character customization.

Further down the line:
- Open world map; free roam driving,
- Multiplayer racing,
- Modding support & more.

// -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/projectcartune/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/projectcartune
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZAJHpkB
